Class ICrashCoordGUIController

  • java.lang.Object
    • lu.uni.lassy.excalibur.examples.icrash.dev.view.gui.abstractgui.AbstractGUIController

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    HasTables

    public class ICrashCoordGUIController
extends AbstractAuthGUIController
    The Class ICrashGUIController, used for dealing with the GUI for the coordinator.

      The textfield that will take a username for logging on.
      private CoordinatorController userController
      The user controller, for this GUI it's the coordinator controller and allows access to coordinator functions like reporting on crises.

      • setUser

        public PtBoolean setUser(CtCoordinator aCtCoordinator)
        Sets the Coordinator to be used with this GUI. We have a one to one relationship. This should be set before showing the form, otherwise the user can't do any actions
        Parameters:
        aCtCoordinator - The class type of coordinator that will be associated with this GUI
        Returns:
        If done successfully, will return a PtBoolean of true
